name: Exercises from FreeCodeCamp

[03 - Factorialize a Number.js](https://github.com/ohkamanda/FreeCodeCamp/blob/master/Basic%20Algorithm%20Scripting/03%20-%20Factorialize%20a%20Number.js)

[10 - Truncate a string](https://github.com/ohkamanda/FreeCodeCamp/blob/master/Basic%20Algorithm%20Scripting/10%20-%20Truncate%20a%20string.js)
